Name: Even Better RNG
Author: pepoluan
Description: Replace SDV RNG with high-performance XoShiRo(128|256)**

Meta:Changelog.1.1.0: Attach to DayStart instead of SaveLoaded, add Reload (F5) functionality
Meta:Changelog.1.2.0: Implement support for Generic Mod Config Menu, cap the gaussian result, and change the gaussian stdev
Meta:Changelog.1.5.0: Provide API for other SMAPI mods
Meta:Changelog.1.6.0: Use XoShiRo256** for 64-bit, change hotkey to KeybindList to allow modifier keys (RightShift, LeftCtrl, etc), instrumentation
Meta:Changelog.1.7.0: Add some CLI, add experimental periodic forcing
Meta:Changelog.1.7.1: Add GetNamedRandom API, remove premature capping in GaussianLuck, optimize GaussianLuck calculation
Meta:Changelog.1.7.2: Periodic forcing is now enforced, experimental per-tick forcing implemented
